midas/examples/hbookexpt/template.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002 
00003 This is a template file for a standard MIDAS - PAW analyzer module.
00004 
00005 Replace all <template> tags with the name of the module (like 
00006 "adccalib" or "scaler") and all <TEMPLATE> tags with the uppercase
00007 name of them.
00008 
00009 It is assumed that the module uses parameters <template>_param, which
00010 appear in the ODB under /Analyzer/Parameters/<template>, a init 
00011 routine which books histos and an event routine. The event routine
00012 looks for a bank "XXXX" and creates a result bank "YYYY" (have to be 
00013 replaced with meaningful names).
00014 
00015 It is assumed that the result bank is a structured bank. Before it
00016 can be used, it has to be defined in the ODB with
00017 
00018 > cd /Equipment/Trigger/Variables
00019 > mkdir <YYYY>
00020 > cd <YYYY>
00021 > create float <item a>
00022 > create int <item b>
00023 > ....
00024 > make
00025 
00026 The "make" command generates <YYYY>_BANK in the file "experim.h", 
00027 which is included in all module files.
00028 
00029 The same has to be done with the module parameters:
00030 
00031 > cd /Analyzer/Parameters
00032 > mkdir <template>
00033 > cd <template>
00034 > create float <parameter a>
00035 > create int <parameter b>
00036 > ....
00037 > make
00038 
00039 The success of the operation can be checked by looking at the
00040 "experim.h" file.
00041 
00042 */
00043 
00044 /********************************************************************\
00045 
00046   Name:         <template>.c
00047   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00048 
00049   Contents:     PiBeta Analyzer module for <template>
00050 
00051   Revision history
00052   ------------------------------------------------------------------
00053   date         by    modification
00054   ---------    ---   ------------------------------------------------
00055   <date>       <XX>  created
00056 
00057 \********************************************************************/
00058 
00059 /*-- Include files -------------------------------------------------*/
00060 
00061 /* standard includes */
00062 #include <stdio.h>
00063 
00064 /* midas includes */
00065 #include "midas.h"
00066 #include "exprim.h"
00067 
00068 /*-- Parameters ----------------------------------------------------*/
00069 
00070 < TEMPLATE > _PARAM < template > _param;
00071 
00072 /*-- Static parameters ---------------------------------------------*/
00073 
00074 
00075 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00076 
00077 INT < template > (EVENT_HEADER *, void *);
00078 INT < template > _init(void);
00079 
00080 <TEMPLATE > _PARAM_STR(<template > _param_str);
00081 
00082 ANA_MODULE < template > _module = {
00083    "<template>",                /* module name           */
00084        "<Your Name>",           /* author                */
00085        <template >,             /* event routine         */
00086        NULL,                    /* BOR routine           */
00087        NULL,                    /* EOR routine           */
00088        <template > _init,       /* init routine          */
00089        NULL,                    /* exit routine          */
00090        &<template > _param,     /* parameter structure   */
00091        sizeof(<template > _param),      /* structure size        */
00092        <template > _param_str,  /* initial parameters    */
00093 };
00094 
00095 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00096 
00097 INT < template > _init(void)
00098 {
00099    /* book histos */
00100 
00101    return SUCCESS;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00105 
00106 INT < template > (EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent) {
00107    int n;
00108    XXXX_BANK *xxxx;
00109    YYYY_BANK *yyyy;
00110 
00111    /* look for <XXXX> bank, return if not present */
00112    n = bk_locate(pevent, "XXXX", &xxxx);
00113    if (n == 0)
00114       return SUCCESS;
00115 
00116    /* create calculated bank */
00117    bk_create(pevent, "YYYY", TID_STRUCT, &yyyy);
00118 
00119   /*---- perform calculations --------------------------------------*/
00120 
00121    yyyy->x = xxxx->x * 2;
00122 
00123   /*---- close calculated bank -------------------------------------*/
00124    bk_close(pevent, yyyy + 1);
00125 
00126    return SUCCESS;
00127 }
